name: Ruba Abu-Salma
tagline: Ph.D. Student at University College London (UCL)
body:
I am a Ph.D. student in the [Department of Computer Science](http://www.cs.ucl.ac.uk/home/) at [University College London (UCL)](http://www.ucl.ac.uk), under the joint supervision of Prof. [M. Angela Sasse](http://sec.cs.ucl.ac.uk/people/m_angela_sasse/) and Dr. [Sarah Meiklejohn](http://www0.cs.ucl.ac.uk/staff/S.Meiklejohn/). We belong to the [Information Security Research Group](http://sec.cs.ucl.ac.uk/home/) and UCL Academic Center of Excellence for Cyber Security Research. Broadly, I research user-centered and secure messaging. My research is funded by a Google Research Award.

I earned an M.Sc. (with Distinction) in Information Security from UCL in 2014, and a B.Sc. (1st Hons) in Computer Engineering from the American University of Sharjah (AUS) in 2013.
